scripts.test: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_LOG=debug RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" ts-node index.ts
scripts.build-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && dna-util -c shortform.dna.workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm test
